name: Valor Chronicles
description:
Synopsis:

After sending all of his students home for the weekend, Jeffery Ahn, the principal of Valor International embarks on a journey to get his thermos back.

Features:

  • Perpetuate the cycle of consumption!
  • Experience caffeine addiction without getting addicted yourself!
  • Sentence chinese fine dust to detention!
  • Buy Valor Peperos from a hole in the ground to help the Valor fundraiser!
  • Endure the deadly effects of broken english!

(Disclaimer: extremely early demo. Levels are minimally complete)
